subtitles:
57058 60228 People once believed
that when someone dies,

60311 63981 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.
64690 68027 But sometimes, something so bad happens

68110 72615 that a terrible sadness is
carried with it, and the soul can't rest.

76535 81082 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.

140766 143894 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?
151652 153779 All right, guys. Let's do it.

153863 157241 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?
158743 160536 They're slacking off from last year.

160619 163414 Three hours to go.
Maybe they're just slow starters.

170546 172798 but you can't come in here
and take her away like this.
172882 174342 There are procedures to stick by.

174425 176761 You guys should have cleared this
with me first.

179930 181557 We found her, Detective,
and you missed it.

181640 184810 I don't care what her name is.
I didn't give the order to move her.

185728 188147 Jesus, Albrecht. I can see why
they took away your gold shield.

188230 190524 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.
192360 194278 All right. Clear out of here.
205623 207583 Tell him to take care of Sarah.

207666 211003 Look, I will. You just lie back.
Come on. Come on.

223641 227686 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.
229855 232066 Shelly just takes care of me.
238114 239949 You lied to her about Eric.
242368 244328 And you're lying to me about Shelly.
256882 258801 Now, come on. Come on. It's--

284869 289457 A building gets torched.
All that is left is ashes.

289540 291792 I used to think
that was true about everything.

296505 300384 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real,

300468 304930 two people who are meant to be together--
nothing can keep them apart.
343260 345137 What are you, like the night watchman?

367785 373082 You know, what this place needs
is a good, natural catastrophe.
376627 379046 No, no. Mickey, come on, man.

379129 381090 You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
381173 383467 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
383551 385469 Hey, come on. Let me do it.
392351 394019 Don't cheap out on me. Lots of onions.

404530 406699 How do you steer that thing
on a wet street?

408951 412371 See, now, Sarah,
she's a genuine hotdogger. You hungry?

428137 430723 You know,
Lake Erie actually caught on fire once
430806 432975 from all the crap floating around in it.
434685 436520 I wish I could have seen that.
542376 545212 All right. We busted that machine.
569278 572656 Oh, shit, guys. T-Bird. Cop car. Cop car.
580372 582499 Bad people out on the street tonight.
593093 594720 Mickey, call it in for me.

707040 712629 "Abashed the Devil stood
and felt how awful goodness is."
712713 716049 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely--"
730606 732691 No, no, no, no. Me first.

787496 790207 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?
791917 793502 Look at that. Look at that.

794878 799174 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

802302 804972 Baby, you need to go over there
and talk to your pals.

808934 811895 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
828370 830580 That shit ain't even loaded, man.

833542 839631 Which of you Motor City motherfuckers
wants to bet me this one isn't?

854187 856231 -Put your guns away, guys.
-How you doing?

1032199 1034951 What is this, Tin Tin?
A bloodstain that's on here?

1037996 1040624 I'll give you 50 bucks.
And I hate charities.
1040707 1042918 Now, you can take it or leave it.
1059226 1060602 Close the gate when you go out!
1060685 1063939 I close this up for you real good, massa.
1067692 1070070 Yeah, sit on it and twirl, you dirty scum.
1074783 1077202 You're lucky I didn't stab your fat ass.

1183725 1186644 What the fuck you all painted up for,
crackhead. Huh?

1239739 1242492 I didn't murder nobody, man.
I don't even fucking know you, man.

1242575 1246496 -What the fuck you want, man?
-I want you to tell me a story.
1246579 1248790 A man and a woman in a loft a year ago.

1252585 1257549 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them on Halloween.
1259843 1262053 Some dude, some bitch-- Whatever, man.
1265223 1268017 You cut her. You raped her.
1269769 1273273 I shanked her pink ass, and she loved it!
1284659 1287036 Murder? Let me tell you about murder.
1290206 1292959 You gonna learn all about it.
1297630 1300216 I'd like you to meet two buddies of mine.
1336544 1341883 Sometimes it rains inside my head
1346054 1350225 Walls are breathing, hands are reaching up

1350308 1353353 Look at this mess.
What's the world coming to?
1359817 1362487 No, they don't have to take you away

1362570 1364739 I got to go upstairs.

1364822 1369410 No, they don't have to take you away
1369494 1371996 Get out of my way, you worms!
1372080 1374374 No, they don't have to take you away
1374457 1375875 Give me some of that over there.

1378253 1380755 Why don't you ladies come by later?

1387720 1390557 Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1391432 1395395 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

-He's taking a meeting.

1441816 1445737 He said, "Childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die."
1484359 1490490 No, they don't have to take you away
1496329 1498581 Hey, kid, get the hell out of the road!
1522105 1524273 I told you to stay out of here.

1524357 1528152 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1530071 1532240 Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1565565 1567984 Who the fuck is this now?

1575032 1578870 Go sleep it off somewhere else, dust head,
unless you want to get mutilated.
1583499 1585626 I'm gonna blow this guy's dick off.

1586836 1589714 Goddamn creatures of the night.
They never learn.

1601809 1605772 as if someone gently rapping--
rapping at my chamber door."
1608524 1610109 What the fuck are you talking about?
1615990 1618034 and you owe me a fucking new door!

1620453 1623456 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.
1636761 1639305 Shit on me. Shit on me!
1646395 1648689 Mr. Gideon, you're not paying attention.
1656614 1660743 I repeat: A gold engagement ring, yes?

1661619 1665581 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1669377 1671879 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1677009 1678970 So who's this sack of shit?

1679053 1682306 That's Tin Tin,
one of T-Bird's little helpers.
1682390 1684809 I think you can rule out accidental death.

1685518 1688312 Don't any of your street demons

1688396 1690147 This could be a turf hit,

1690231 1692316 but it doesn't look like
your usual gang crap.
1694277 1697363 You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.
1697446 1699365 I'm supposed to thank you for that, right?

1699991 1703202 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.
1704412 1706205 What the hell do you call that?
1710543 1713796 I suppose you'll write it up as graffiti.
1713880 1717133 You can leave my crime scene now, okay?

1726893 1729520 -Don't you know this game?

1730229 1732481 All right, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1732565 1735610 They're in that metal box.
It's under the shelf there.
1737403 1739405 Take them. Take the fucking rings!

1739488 1742742 You can chew them, and you can choke
on them, you son of a bitch!

1746162 1748748 -Look, it goes up to the attic.
-Okay.
1767350 1769644 It's beautiful. I don't believe it.

1793709 1796629 -You have one chance to live.
-Look, man, take anything you want.

1801092 1804929 Now you're gonna tell me where to find
the rest of Tin Tin's little party pals.
1805012 1806931 The Pit. They all hang out at The Pit.

1807014 1809725 All of T-Bird's little potato heads
hang out there.

1809809 1812061 Funboy, he lives there--
upstairs, all right?
1826742 1830621 Each one of these is a life.
1833290 1835876 I'm begging you, all right. Don't kill me.

1839714 1843884 Your job will be to tell the rest of them
that death is coming for them.
1852476 1854979 Tell them Eric Draven sends his regards.

1858566 1862153 You walk out of here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1862737 1864572 You're nothing but street grease,
you hear?
1890890 1893517 On the house, kiddo. You know that.

1901525 1905988 Your mom, technically,
she's off right now.
1912828 1916832 Police! Don't move. I said don't move.

1920878 1923547 Well, I am the police,
and I say don't move, Snow White.
1926217 1930054 And I say I'm dead and I move.
1930721 1933432 Not one more step. I'm serious.
1933516 1937853 Then shoot, if you will, Officer Albrecht.
1937937 1941065 What are you, nuts? Walking into a gun?

1946112 1950199 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1952910 1954829 I want you to move over to the curb there.
1954912 1956539 Come on, real nice and easy.
1960501 1962044 We're gonna wait here for backup.
1962962 1964880 It's getting too frigging weird for me.
1967133 1969468 Do you know someone named T-Bird?

1969552 1972388 He had a friend
who shouldn't have played with knives.
1974306 1975891 You're the guy that murdered Tin Tin.

1981355 1984150 He died a year ago,
the moment he touched her.

1986485 1989655 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.

2008340 2010718 Guy shows up
looking like a mime from hell,
2011218 2013095 and you lose him right out in the open.

2015222 2018434 at least he didn't do
that walking-against-the-wind shit.
2021979 2023522 What the hell is going on here?

2027818 2030404 I just wish I was a little hungry again,

2030946 2034658 -Be careful what you ask for.

2046837 2049924 There are energies aligning against you.

2075574 2078077 Nobody cleared this little event with me.
2078160 2080079 I didn't have nothing to do with that.
2080162 2082623 I'm sure you must be awful disappointed.

2089338 2091966 Somebody stuck his blades
in all his major organs

2105104 2109984 -Whatever you say, I can do.

2169793 2172004 He was a butt face. I could have made it.

2181388 2183640 It's more like surfing than skating.
2183724 2185768 I wish the rain would stop, just once.
2186852 2188812 It can't rain all the time.

2212503 2216215 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.

2221345 2225474 "We, the undersigned tenants
of 1929 Caulderon Court apartments--"

2226850 2229728 A big kick-me sign for a very nice girl

2229812 2231230 and a cause that got her killed.

2231313 2233899 She was fighting tenant eviction

2233982 2239196 Shelly Webster and her
nice rock-and-roll boyfriend Eric Draven.

2239279 2241782 You know, the last time

2241865 2243492 is when you got put back on the beat.

2255546 2258298 You're gonna wind up

2259550 2262010 -I'm cool.
-You didn't get that file from me, okay?
2262094 2264680 And don't tell me you owe me one.
2297671 2301383 Tomorrow night, we can-- we can get high

2301467 2305304 and watch this whole fucking city burn

2330579 2332789 There's a big fucking bird over there.
2372746 2375082 You nearly gave me a fucking heart attack!

2381880 2385092 It's time for you to take your bird

2403777 2405237 Did you look in the mirror?
2405320 2408407 I mean, you need professional help.

2447446 2449239 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2490322 2492282 I've got a gun in my pocket.
2495160 2496953 You're happy to see me, aren't you?
2515764 2519685 Stay away! Stay away from me!

2531363 2535909 "Mother is the name for God

2616782 2619701 This is a first. Do I bow or do I curtsy?
2620494 2622579 Now, get my friend here a glass of blood.

2695026 2696945 We lost the lives of two firefighters.

the constant surveillance
2704619 2706872 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.

2818733 2823029 I was-- I was hoping

2823113 2824698 Give me something I could work with.
2831454 2833957 Why didn't you do something about it?

2835959 2839170 even the ones who signed the petition,

2844050 2846928 and finally got busted for

2866156 2868408 I used to think they were kind of trivial.

2899022 2900774 I thought I'd use your front door.

2907447 2910200 I'm sorry as hell for what happened

2922212 2925173 I got stabbed. I shot the son of a bitch.
2925256 2927509 I watched the bullet hole close by itself.

2934307 2937060 I saw him too. He had a guitar.

2951241 2952742 I mean, what do I get?

2984983 2988444 You know, you're directly

2994159 2997120 It's one of the most important things

2997203 2998830 Sister? She's supposed to be your sister?

3003793 3005670 What's the matter?
You don't see the resemblance?

3013052 3016472 He had a bird with him.

3016556 3020101 He told me to tell T-Bird

3020185 3022395 Whatever the fuck that means. And--
3023146 3026232 Draven. He said his name was Eric Draven.
3027275 3028776 Want to relax that thing now?

3029485 3032822 And this bird man--

3034240 3037744 You sure you ain't making all of this up

3038536 3040663 I ain't making all this up.
3041372 3044584 I ain't twisted like you two fucks.
3069817 3071694 For fuck's sake, die, will you?

3086918 3089170 Then he choked to death on his own blood.
3090838 3093549 I'll have the janitor come on up.

3183014 3185475 I don't know how many times

3189562 3191481 You know how long it took us

3212335 3215380 Probably still banging away on Darla.

3291789 3295168 Stupid ass hair! You hit my car!

3308806 3311684 We could use you. You did Tin Tin.

3322069 3324489 I hate this.

3343716 3346719 This is vehicle 48.

3352725 3356062 If you got something personal, amigo,

3407363 3409699 I hate this. This ain't good.

3453659 3456537 Who gives a shit? It's ancient history.

3483522 3485900 You can't be you.

3487985 3491113 This is the really real world.

3491197 3493532 We killed you dead.

3511509 3513969 and felt how awful goodness is."

3584248 3586542 This is the 7:00 a.m. edition
of Action News.

3586625 3589336 For over a decade,
the night before Halloween

3589420 3593382 has had a darker and deadlier nickname
in the inner city, "Devil's Night--"

3593466 3596927 The name given to what has become
an annual plague of arson.

3604059 3607688 of what may become the biggest
and deadliest Devil's Night ever,

3607772 3611275 the mayor has firefighters
from all surrounding counties...

3611358 3615154 Do you like them up or over?
I can't remember.

3617198 3619992 What are you doing?
I don't even like eggs.

3625372 3628209 So what do you want now?
Black coffee and cigarettes?

3629210 3632046 So what did you take
to become mother of the year?

3633464 3637718 It wasn't drugs.
Someone kind of woke me up.

3645893 3648229 Did you win the lottery
or something, Darla?
3653609 3655653 I never was too good at this mommy shit.
3660282 3664161 I like them over easy, Mom.

3680886 3683514 This is the third hit
in your hood in 24 hours.

3683597 3686600 We just fished this out of the river.

3686684 3688853 We're gonna have to ID his teeth.

3692314 3694984 Looks like he zigged
when he should have zagged.

3707830 3710875 I got a goddamn vigilante Killer
knocking off scumbags left and right,
3710958 3712376 and you're covering up for somebody.

3714044 3716422 Who's the cartoon character
in the painted face?

3716505 3719174 Hey, you're the detective.
Why don't you tell me?

3719258 3722678 Okay. Gideon's blows all to hell, and

3722761 3725556 who winds up in T-Bird's car
when it zigs instead of zags.

3725639 3728017 Then you steal one of my case files
from homicide,

3728100 3730603 and you're saying this is just
a fucking automobile accident?

3733230 3735065 I didn't want to interrupt you.
It sounded good.
3735149 3736650 You gotta write that shit down.

3739820 3742239 The captain's got
a little love note waiting for you.

3742323 3744950 Welcome to the first day
of the rest of your suspension.
3804927 3807554 One for sorrow, two for joy.

3807638 3810391 -Come here.
-Three for a girl and four for a boy.

3912451 3914036 That is from your song, right?
3926256 3928008 Come on, Eric. I know you're here.
3938685 3940771 I get so lonely all by myself.
3944608 3947653 To hell with you. I thought you cared.

3966130 3968340 He was all painted up white

3968423 3971593 I seen him. T-Bird sent me in

3971677 3974096 Then he took him away.

3974179 3977099 And he flash fried T-Bird

3986150 3988777 Fire it up! Fire it up!

4009464 4011550 And now this ghost gonna kill my ass next!
4016013 4018765 This ghost gonna kill my ass next.

4063227 4065479 Are you referring to anyone in particular?

4077866 4079785 Maybe it was your fairy godfather.

4089586 4091255 You want a friend to walk you home?
4140220 4144516 You things, things, things of the flesh

4189353 4192272 It seems our friend T-Bird

4192356 4194649 on account of a slight case of death.
4201865 4204159 Devil's Night is upon us again.
4205160 4206870 I thought we'd throw a little party,

4206953 4210290 start a bunch of fires,

4214961 4219466 Problem is, it's all been done before.

4247494 4249788 See, that's what's

4249871 4252666 And I'll tell you. When I used to think

4252749 4255043 it put a big old smile on my face.

4280735 4282654 Do you know what they got now?
4293415 4297627 The idea has become the institution, boys.

4300130 4302549 You don't want us to do

4308054 4309639 the gods will notice us again.

4311349 4314561 I want all of you boys to be able to

4314644 4318440 and say, "Are we having fun or what?"

4376831 4378792 Now let's see you enforce it.
